Dear {{FIRST_NAME}},

Isha Foundation is pleased to announce that Sadhguru's new book, Inner Engineering: A Yogi's Guide to Joy, will be released on September 20th, 2016, along with which Sadhguru will tour the US. The book helps one to master the most sophisticated machine on the planet - the human being.

For the first time, Sadhguru will present Western readers with a path to achieving absolute well-being through the classical science of yoga in a practical, accessible book. The wisdom distilled in this transformative book offers readers time-tested tools for creating inner situations exactly the way you want them, turning you into the architect of your own joy.

To pre-order your copy, click here: Inner Engineering: A Yogi's Guide to Joy

In timing with this book's release, Sadhguru will be coming to North America in September through October and appearing in programmes around the US & Canada to inspire audiences with his wisdom, wit and piercing logic.

Featured in 17 headlining public talks from New York to L.A., Sadhguru will be offering refreshing and unique insights into many aspects of life, ranging from the mundane to the ultimate.  (City listing below.)

For more details on Sadhguru's upcoming Fall Tour, click here: Meetsadhguru.org

Over 33,000 are anticipated to attend these 2-hour talks around North America.  Sadhguru's presence creates an extraordinary opportunity to break through limitations into one's natural state of freedom, love and joy. We hope you and those you love will be in the audience.  

We welcome your support in helping the book reach as wide an audience as possible.  

Warm Regards,
Isha Volunteers

Additional Tour Details

Boston, MA: September 17 | New York, NY: September 20
New Brunswick, NJ: September 22 | Washington, DC: September 23
